sentences.sContent: There were several possibilities open to each manufacturer.
sentences.sCn: 每个制造商都可以有几种不同的选择。

sentences.sContent: ...which is examining the possibility of outsourcing...
...the early-decision system needlessly and prematurely narrows the field of possibility just at a time when students should be opening themselves to a whole range of thrilling options...
...the possibility that they are now bound to go to a school that...
...Paul McCartney looked into the possibility of going to America to record their next album...
...A 100 need not imply that there is no possibility of improvement...

synos.tran: 可能性；可能发生的事物

words.tran: 可能性；合适的人；可能的事物

trans.tranOther: A possibility is one of several different things that could be done.
